name: Ryu-Ge End
effectText: Your opponent cannot target "Ryu-Ge" monsters you control with card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ryu-Ge End" once per turn. If a "Ryu-Ge" Pendulum Monster is in your field or face-up Extra Deck: You can shuffle 2 "Ryu-Ge" monsters from your hand, GY, and/or banishment into the Main Deck, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. If this card is destroyed: You can Set 1 non-Continuous "Ryu-Ge" Trap from your Deck, GY, or banishment.
